definition: Dashan, stage name of Canadian Mark Henry Rowswell (1965-), actor and well-known TV personality in PRC
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
to chatter idly/to gossip/to boast or brag
to chat (1980s Beijing slang)/to chew the fat
(bird species of China) great tit (Parus major)

sentences.english: Look, Dashan. There's a service station straight ahead.
sentences.chinese: 大山，你看，前边有一家加油站。

sentences.english: They dug through the mountain to build a tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 他们掘穿大山筑一条隧道。

sentences.english: Som boon leelathitikul slowly fall into the trap.
sentences.chinese: 李大山慢慢落入了圈套。

sentences.english: Shuimu Art Space is located within Beijing 798 Dashanzi Art district.
sentences.chinese: 水木当代艺术空间在北京大山子798艺术区。

sentences.english: The contour of that mountain looks like a dragon.
sentences.chinese: 那座大山的表面看上去像一条龙。

sentences.english: Can you sing with all the voices of the mountain?
sentences.chinese: 你能否籍大山的千重回响吟唱？

sentences.english: Yes, famous for abseiling across a large mountain face or something.
sentences.chinese: 是的，在著名的大山面什么的绳降。

sentences.english: Adorning the Jin Dashan of milistary exploit chapter is demobilized from army before the bosom, returned home town.
sentences.chinese: 胸前佩戴着军功章的金大山从部队复员，回到了家乡。

sentences.english: Blankets and bedclothes the child of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 大山是山之子的地毯和床单。

sentences.english: Above was an angry sky, from which rain fell and in which lightning played.
sentences.chinese: 大山之上是怒吼的天空，大雨滂沱，雷电肆虐。

sentences.english: There are so three Tashan at, physically care for of Di two wives also not turnover.
sentences.chinese: 有这么三座大山在，实际管事的狄二太太也不好周转。

sentences.english: The next morning when I opened the window I was astonished to find out what a grand mountain.
sentences.chinese: 第二天清早推窗，才一惊，好一座大山，堵着天。

sentences.english: There is no question in my mind that it is Mt.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，这个人毫无疑问是非洲大山木大叔。

sentences.english: When visiting in countryside nearby Fuping, I saw collieries and mountains with embankments.
sentences.chinese: 观富平附近的农村时，我看到了煤矿和梯田式的大山。

sentences.english: Then the gold seekers had to move their supplies up the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 随后，这些淘金者还必须将他们的补给运过大山。

definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
tall and erect, reaching through the clouds (idiom); used to describe tall mountain or skyscraper
the peaks of a mountain range
